name: iM: iPeg pretty balls solitaire puzzle for children and parents. Free. Lite.
name_original: iM: iPeg pretty balls solitaire puzzle for children and parents. Free. Lite.
description:
A classic wooden game
Have you ever played those classic peg puzzle games in restaurants? Remember how entertained you were waiting for you're waiting for your food or the waitress? Well, wait no more. No longer do you have to go out to play, but now iPeg is available on your iPhone/iPod. Test your skills and see how many you can leave remaining. Try to clear the board by jumping pegs over other pegs. Remember, the less, the better. Challenge your friends, see who can do the best.
